name: Imagine That!
description:
A short adventure game in which the player takes on the role of a young boy looking to reclaim his JoyBoy taken by his mother.  Use your imagination to solve puzzles and reclaim your lost console!

Made in 48 hours for the 2014 St. Louis Global Game Jam

https://globalgamejam.org/2014/games/imagine-2

Scenario:

Drew Lang

Writing:

Nicholas Amrich, Chad Damazyn, Drew Lang, Daniel Nagel

Design:

Nicholas Amrich, Chad Damazyn, Drew Lang, Daniel Nagel

Environment Artist:

Drew Lang

Character Artist:

Kayla Loughran

Object Artist:

Nicholas Amrich

Animation:

Nicholas Amrich, Drew Lang, Daniel Nagel

Programming:

Nicholas Amrich, Daniel Nagel

Music:

Erik Wolfe
